certificate.title: Showcase your skills with certificate
certificate.description: This program guides you through the key stages of UX/UI design, from user needs analysis to interactive prototypes.

banner.title: About the program
banner.description:
This program guides you through the key stages of UX/UI design, from user needs
              analysis to interactive prototypes. You'll gain both theoretical knowledge and
              practical skills to create modern design solutions, focusing on trends like dark mode,
              responsive design.

expectations.title: What to expect after course?
expectations.description: You know the fundamentals of UX/UI design, can create interactive prototypes, and have a certificate to prove your skills.

mentor.title: Meet your mentor
mentor.name: Aistė Gerdzevičiūtė
mentor.role: Co-founder | Product designer and UX/UI instructor
mentor.description: Aistė is a co-founder of Unicamp and a product designer with 5 years of experience. She has worked with startups and corporations, helping them to create user-friendly products. Aistė is passionate about design systems and AI tools for designers.

prices.title: One-time
prices.description: Pay full price and don’t worry about next payments.

prices.title: Financial aid
prices.description: Apply for financial aid and have opportunity to lear for free.
